description:
House price index

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
61262 Residential property price indices

Definition:
Development of prices to be paid for new and existing
residential property (single-family and two-family houses
and dwellings in apartment blocks), including the land. The
house price index is designed as an indicator of expenditure
on residential property in terms of investment goods.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: House price index
